MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG10 postcode area of Moffat.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.51pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Annanside substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:26pm on Tuesday 27th October 2020.
